title: "Carnegie Mellon University's AI-Powered FRIDA robot collaborates with humans to create art"
excerpt: "FRIDA, a robotic arm with a paintbrush taped to it, uses artificial intelligence to collaborate with humans on works of art. Ask FRIDA to paint a picture, and it gets to work putting brush to canvas."
